wiki.summary: "AS IF IT'S YOUR LAST" (마지막처럼) is BLACKPINK's 5th single, released on June 22, 2017. It was written by Teddy Park, Brother Su, Choice37, Future Bounce, Lydia Paek and produced by Teddy Park. Musically, it has been described as a synth-pop, house, reggae and moombahton song, whose lyrics talk about finding and losing love. Commercially, the song debuted atop the Billboard World Digital Songs chart, at #2 on K-pop Hot 100 and at #3 on the Gaon Digital Chart. The single sold more than 2.5 million copies in South Korea. Read more on Last.fm.
